Baby Icons Freebie - Part 3/4
Published on: 22 Apr 2015

That's the third post (in a series of four) about handmade baby icons, designed using Sketch. You can see the first and second post.

I designed these icons while working on the development of Mamae, an iOS application that I've created together with my husband.

Download:

  • Sketch file
  • PNG files
  • SVG files

It is also available via Github.

Here you can find two illustrations that might give you some inspiration about the icons usage:

I would love to receive your feedback about the icons. Feel free to contact me.

You are permitted to use the resources for any number of personal and commercial projects. You may modify the resources according to your requirements and include them into works, such as websites, applications or other materials intended for sale. No attribution or link back to this site is required, however any credit will be much appreciated.

About me

My name is Danielle Vicosa. I live and work in Berlin, Germany. I design mobile and web applications and my passion is to transform challenging requirements into human and intuitive experiences. I believe that a good design can impact other people's lives in a positive and useful way.
